TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripSplitButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem

summary.span: 表示左侧标准按钮和右侧下拉按钮的组合，如果 的值为 ，则这两个按钮位置互换。

span.span: Represents a combination of a standard button on the left and a drop-down button on the right, or the other way around if the value of is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组合按钮和下拉按钮的功能。 combines button and drop-down button functionality. 使用 属性将所 选下拉项的事件与按钮上显示的项同步。Use the property to synchronize the event of the chosen drop-down item with the item shown on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripSplitButton1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripSplitButton1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 有 ，则 ENTER 键将激活按钮。If a has a , the ENTER key activates the button. 否则，ENTER 键将激活下拉。Otherwise, the ENTER key activates the drop-down. 使用 属性将所 选下拉项的事件与按钮上显示的项同步。Use the property to synchronize the event of the chosen drop-down item with the item shown on the button.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnRightToLeftChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnRightToLeftChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 值之一，表示要处理的键。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 处理对话框键。

span.span: Processes a dialog key.

returns.span: 如果键已由该项处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理过程中，将调用此方法来处理 ENTER 键和空格键，以便引发 事件。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the ENTER and SPACEBAR keys in order to raise the event. 但是，如果 未启用，则此方法将调用基类实现。However, if the is not enabled, this method calls the base class implementation instead. 仅当 方法指示该项未处理该键时，才调用此方法。This method is called only if the method indicates that the item is not processing the key.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写方法时，重写实现应返回 以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 派生类很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
